verses.text: Ach in Diosal, ch'oxeli to malaj in mul. Ochanh valumaloc t'a juntzanh anima malaj elk'och t'a yol sat tik. Colinel t'a eb' naumq'ue lolonel yet' t'a eb' chuk sb'eyb'al.
Ach in Diosal, in Columal ach, 多tas val yuj najat tzin ik'canel t'a ichanh? 多Tas val yuj cusnac in k'ool tzin b'eyeq'ui, tzin yixtan eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin?
Ch'ox a sakil k'inal t'ayin yet' a lolonel te yel, yic wach' ol in sch'ox t'a sb'eal jun tzalan yic ejmelal b'aj cajan ach eq'ui.
Ach in Diosal, ol in k'och t'a altar, ata' ol ach in b'itejnhej yet' te' arpa, yujto a ach tzak' in tzalajk'olal.
多Tas val yuj schab'axq'ue in k'ool? 多Tas yuj somchaj in pensar? Ach in Diosal ayach och yipoc in k'ool, olto val wach' lolonel t'ayach, in Columal, in Diosal aji.
